meanings.definition: To kill or destroy in excess.
meanings.sent1: The hunter overkills the deer by shooting it multiple times.
meanings.sent2: She always overkills her plants by watering them too much.
meanings.sent3: The chef overkills the pasta by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent4: The storm overkills the fragile sandcastle on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The superhero overkills the villain with his powerful laser beam.

meanings.definition: An instance of excessive killing or destruction.
meanings.sent1: The massacre in the movie was an overkills of violence.
meanings.sent2: The overkills of innocent civilians in the war deeply affected the nation.
meanings.sent3: The overkills of toppings on the pizza made it impossible to eat.
meanings.sent4: The overkills of colors in the painting created a chaotic masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The overkills of decorations in the room made it look like a fairy tale.
